description:
Enpass is a cross-platform password management app to securely store passwords and other credentials in a virtual vault locked with a master password. Unlike most other popular password managers, Enpass is an offline password manager.


In this quick release, we've addressed an issue where some users were encountering the "Please authorize again using OneDrive account" error message.

Questions? VisitÂ discussion.enpass.io for help, email support@enpass.io, or tweet @EnpassApp.
